name: Twitter's Journey To Give Internet To All
name_original: Twitter's Journey To Give Internet To All
description:
How To  Start: Click The Start Button On The Other Side Though If You Click The Reset Button You Stop The Game.
____________________________________________
Controls: Press Space Or The Up Button To Fly Up Your Goal Is To Go Through The Pipes That Block Your Wifi Connection.
____________________________________________
Story: Twitter Bird (Larry) Found Out Not Everyone Can Access Twitter So He Set Out On An Epic Journey To Bring Internet To Everyone So Everyone Can Partake In Twitter.
